alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Harper (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 12:27AM CDT until June 10 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Ellis County in northwestern Oklahoma... Southwestern Harper County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1227 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southeast of Slapout to 10 miles south of Follett, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shattuck, Laverne, Gage, Fargo, May, and Catesby. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
